main event: A civilian pilot reported a whitish blue object descending at high speed on 15 June 1955.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for only 1 minute., The object was reported to be descending rapidly and had no visible lights or markings., The observation was classified under Ground-Radar type., The object was speculated to possibly be astronomical, likely a meteor., The report was sent to multiple high-ranking officials in the U.S. Air Force.
